meanings.sent1: I decided to take electives in art and music this semester.
meanings.sent2: Students can choose their electives based on their interests.
meanings.sent3: The elective in photography really developed my skills behind the camera.
meanings.sent4: Exploring different electives is like trying out different flavors of ice cream.
meanings.sent5: Her passion for electives shone through in her diverse course selection.

meanings.sent1: The elective committee members were elected by the student body.
meanings.sent2: The elective positions were filled through a fair voting process.
meanings.sent3: It was an elective decision to choose the team captain through voting.
meanings.sent4: Being elected as class president was a great honor for him.
meanings.sent5: The elective system ensured equal opportunity for all candidates.
